property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the start of your third turn, flip Lucifron.; BACK: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, Lucifron deals 6 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Magmadar has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, flip Magmadar.; BACK: Magmadar has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1, Exhaust a Hunter in your party > Flip Magmadar. Any player may use this power during that player's turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.; At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero chosen at random. That hero's controller discards a card. Flip Gehennas.; BACK: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.; At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally. Flip Gehennas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Garr has +3 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of each turn, if you have four or fewer Firesworn, flip Garr.; BACK: Garr has +6 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1 > Destroy one of your Firesworn. If you do, it deals 2 fire damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: When Baron Geddon enters play, each opponent destroys all but five of his resources.; At the end of your turn, Baron Geddon deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally for each resource you have.; [Activate] > Flip Baron Geddon.; BACK: Destroy Baron Geddon > Baron Geddon deals 12 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Use only if Baron Geddon has 12 or more damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Shazzrah has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1 > Flip Shazzrah. Use only once per turn.; BACK: When Shazzrah flips to this side, drop him from at least three feet above play. He deals 5 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally he lands on.; At the start of your turn, flip Shazzrah.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Sulfuron Harbinger has +4 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; [Activate] > Flip Sulfuron Harbinger. Use only on your turn.; BACK: Sulfuron Harbinger has +8 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Golemagg has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, Golemagg deals 3 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.; At the start of your turn, if Golemagg has 15 or more damage, flip him.; BACK: Golemagg has +5 while attacking and can attack only heroes.; When Golemagg is dealt damage, he deals 5 melee damage to the source of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If it's heads, prevent all damage that would be dealt by opposing allies until your next turn. If it's tails, destroy all abilities attached to your allies and prevent all damage that would be dealt with opposing abilities until your next turn.; At the end of each turn, if you have no allies, flip Majordomo Executus.; BACK: When Majordomo Executus flips to this side, say, Behold Ragnaros-the Firelord! He who was ancient when this world was young! Bow before him, mortals! Bow before your ending! Ragnaros awakens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: FRONT: Untargetable; Ragnaros can't be dealt damage. You can't play or discard cards.; At the start of your turn, flip Ragnaros.; BACK: Ragnaros has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; Ragnaros can't be dealt fire damage. At the end of your turn, if you have exactly three resources, put eight Sons of Flame into play and flip Ragnaros.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, roll a die.; 1: Nothing happens.; 2-3: Magmadar deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in a party of your choice.; 4-5: Magmadar deals 3 fire damage to an opposing hero or ally.; 6: Each opponent puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, destroy all opposing abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, if a hero is The Bomb, Baron Geddon deals 5 fire damage to that hero and each ally in its party.; At the end of your turn, choose an opposing hero to be The Bomb until the ned of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent plays an ability card, interrupt it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Core Ragers can't be destroyed or otherwise leave your control while your hero is Golemagg.; When Golemagg is destroyed, remove all of your Core Ragers from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent chooses an ally in his party and removes it from the game. If your hero is Majordomo Executus, you choose instead.; Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, remove it from the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent destroys one of his resources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target opposing hero or ally, and your hero deals 3 fire damage to it.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character, or 4 damage if your hero is Golemagg.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 4 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. If your hero is Gehennas, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all of target opponent's abilities, allies, and equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may flip your hero.; If your hero is Sulfuron Harbinger, you may ready him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target opposing ally. If your hero is Magmadar, he also deals 2 fire damage to each other hero and ally in that ally's party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target opposing ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If your hero is Baron Geddon, that ally deals fire damage equal to ist cost to each other hero and ally in ist party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or interrupt target ability card. If your hero is Lucifron, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step. While your hero is Garr, each ally in that ally's party can't ready during its controller's ready step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party. If your hero is Shazzrah, draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have five or more resources, destroy target opposing hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ancient Core Hound enters play, roll a die.; 1-2: Exhaust all opposing allies.; 3-4: Ancient Core Hound deals 2 fire damage to each ally in a party of your choice.; 5-6: Put an opposing ally into ist owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Firelord enters play, put a Lava Spawn into play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lava Annihilator enters play, you may destroy target ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lava Pack enters play, put the top card of the Minion deck into play as an ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lava Surger deals combat damage to a hero, ready Lava Surger. It can't attack that hero this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid Destroyer has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raid Giants has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two: Destroy all opposing abilities; destroy all opposing allies; or destroy all opposing equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When an opposing ally is destroyed, draw a card.; When an opposing hero is destroyed, draw a card for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a hero or ally deals damage to Ragnaros this turn, Ragnaros deals that much fire damage to each hero and ally in that character's party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ragnaros deals 50 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. That damage can't be prevented.; Fury of the Firelord can't be interrupted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment. Its controller destroys another one of his abilities, allies, or equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in target player's party for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Ragnaros isn't Submerged and was dealt no damage this turn, Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to that player's hero for each rune you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all of target opponent's equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, Ragnaros has +X ATK, is untargetable, and can't be protected against.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target ally. Ragnaros deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a hero in that ally's party.
